title: Big Data Analytics – The Tools and Technology in Drug Discovery
abstract: Big data Analytics is one of the trending worlds in the technical world. Each and everything is seen as a data and everyone begins to know the value of the data now. All these things are only due to growth of the analytics in the current decade. There were many tools available to implement the concept of big data in the market some are paid tools, and some are open source. In this paper the first section deals with some of the available tools and where these tools can be applicable. Since big data is used to handle different types of data it can be used in various sectors. The user has to decide the tools depend upon the nature of the problem to be solved. The next section discusses the advantages of Big data in the field of Drug Discovery.
